datafield.subfield: wa-dhikr faḍlihā wa-tasmīyat man ḥallahā min al-amāthil aw ijtāza bi-nawāḥīhā min wāridīhā wa-ahlihā /
taṣnīf Abī al-Qāsim ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥasan ibn Hibat Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Shāfiʻī al-maʻrūf bi-Ibn ʻAsākir ; biṭaḥqīq Ṣalāh al-Dīn al-Munajjid.

1 [al-Muqaddimah] -- 2:1 Khiṭaṭ Dimashq -- 2:2 al-Sīrah al-Nabawīyah, al-qism 1. -- 2:3 al-Sīrah al-Nabawīyah, al-qism 2. -- 3ʻAbd Allāh ibn Jābir - ʻAbd Allāh ibn Zayd -- 6 ʻUthmān ibn ʻAffān -- 7 Aḥmad ibn ʻUtbah - Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Muʾammal -- 10 [Busr ibn Abī Arṭāh - Thābit ibn Aqram] -- 31 ʻĀṣim - ʻĀyidh -- 32 ʻUbādah ibn Awfá -ʻAbd Allāh ibn Thuwab -- 34 ʻAbd Allāh ibn Sālim - ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī ʻĀʾishah -- 38 ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qays - ʻAbd Allāh ibn Masʻadah -- 39 ʻAbd Allāh ibn Masʻūd - ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd ibn Bakkār -- 40 ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd ibn Ḥabīb - ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh -- 41 ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Ḥasan - ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Miswar ibn Makhramah -- 42 ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Maṣād - ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz -- 43 ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn ʻUmar - ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn Zayd al-Baṣrī -- 44 ʻAbd al- Wāḥid ibn Saʻīd - ʻUbaydah ibn Ashʻab -- al-mujallad 45 ʻUbaydah ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Ḥakīm - ʻUthmān ibn ʻAṭāʾ ibn Muyassarah -- al-mujallad 47 ʻUthmān ibn ʻAlī - ʻAṭāʾ ibn Abī Rabāḥ -- baʻḍ al-mujallad 52 wa-al-mujallad 53. [in1 v.] ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb -- al-mujallad 54. ʻUmar ibn Khayrān - ʻAmr ibn Baḥr al-Jāḥiẓ wa-fīhi ʻUmar ibn ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz.
